dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: I'm on a mission to save the world from an evil villain.

dialogue.speaker: Villain
dialogue.text: Foolish hero, you will never succeed in your quest!

dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: We'll see about that. I've got a few tricks up my sleeve.

dialogue.speaker: Villain
dialogue.text: Oh yeah? Well, I've got a plan to take down the hero once and for all!
